title: Tungsten Axe
summaries: The Tungsten Axe is an early game axe, being stronger than both the Iron and Lead Axe, and weaker than both the Gold and Platinum Axe. It has an alternative version, the Silver Axe, which is slightly weaker. Like all axes, it is used to cut down trees, cacti, and Giant Glowing Mushrooms.
Its best modifier is Light for harvesting purposes and Legendary for combat purposes.

statistics.Sell: 12
